_header: Led I the dance a midsummer day
_description: Jack and the Dancing Maid, an erotic carol — nine 5-line stanzas (aaaab) and burden: ‘Alas ales the wyle / Thout Y on no gyle / So haue Y god chaunce / Alas ales the wyle / That euer Y cowde daunce’

CamGon383.First Lines:
Ladd y þe dance a myssomur dayy made smale trippus soþ
                    for to say…
CamGon383.Last Lines:
…Euel þerinne wern euer it wole outþout y on no
                    gyle
